mapper.select: SELECT MCC_L_CODE, MCC_M_CODE, MCC_S_CODE, MCC_L_NAME, MCC_M_NAME, MCC_S_NAME, MCC_CODE_TYPE, MCC_SORT_ORDER FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND MCC_L_CODE = #{mcc_l_code} AND MCC_M_CODE = #{mcc_m_code} AND MCC_S_CODE != ' ' ORDER BY MCC_SORT_ORDER, MCC_S_CODE
SELECT MVI_VVRMNO, MVI_VVRMNAME, MVI_TEAMNO, MVI_SYPATTN FROM MF_VVRM_INFO WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' ORDER BY MVI_VVRMNAME

SELECT MCC_L_CODE, MCC_M_CODE, MCC_S_CODE, MCC_L_NAME, MCC_M_NAME, MCC_S_NAME, MCC_CODE_TYPE, MCC_SORT_ORDER FROM MF_COMM_CODE WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND MCC_L_CODE = '100' AND MCC_M_CODE = '120' AND MCC_S_CODE != ' ' ORDER BY MCC_SORT_ORDER, MCC_S_CODE

SELECT MCC_L_CODE, MCC_M_CODE, MCC_S_CODE, MCC_L_NAME, MCC_M_NAME, MCC_S_NAME, MCC_CODE_TYPE, MCC_SORT_ORDER FROM MF_COMM_CODE A WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND MCC_L_CODE = '100' AND MCC_M_CODE = '120' AND MCC_S_CODE != ' ' AND EXISTS ( SELECT MAG_GRPCODE FROM MF_AUTH_GRP A WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND MAG_GRPCODE != 'SA' AND MAG_GRPCODE = A.MCC_S_CODE AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE MTI_TEAMNO = (SELECT MUI_TEAMNO FROM MF_USER_INFO WHERE MUI_ID = A.MAG_ID) AND MTI_TEAMNO = #{mti_teamno} ) )
SELECT MDI_LINKNO, MDI_DPTNAME FROM MF_DPT_INFO WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' ORDER BY MDI_DPTNAME
SELECT MTI_TEAMNO, MTI_TEAMNAME FROM MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE MTI_DPTNO = #{mti_dptno} AND CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' ORDER BY MTI_TEAMNAME
